SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: American bison (similar to and often called buffalo)
situation with buffalo:
estimated 50 million bison in North America (1700s)
building of Transcontinental Railroad (middle of 1800s)
settling of West
overhunting of bison
two herds of bison, in north and in south
southern herd extinct and northern almost extinct (1900)
steps to save buffalo:
creation of organizations to save bison
creation of preserves to protect bison
more than 30,000 bison in North America (today)
